techmeme.title: Google releases Gemini 2.0 Flash via its API, an experimental Gemini 2.0 Pro version via its apps, Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking, and 2.0 Flash-Lite in AI Studio (Jess Weatherbed/The Verge)
In 2024, ransomware attackers received ~$813.55M in payments from victims, down 35% on 2023's record $1.25B, as more victims refused to pay (Chainalysis)
Oura Ring 4 review: comfortable, better data collection, and gorgeous, clean app, but requires a paid subscription to use basic features and colors cost more (Daniel Cooper/Engadget)
AWS aims to use "automated reasoning", which uses mathematical logic to encode knowledge in AI systems in a structured way, to prevent AI models' hallucinations (Belle Lin/Wall Street Journal)
The USPS resumes accepting China and Hong Kong mail hours after suspension due to Trump's EO, disrupting e-commerce, and is implementing "the new China tariffs" (Annie Palmer/CNBC)
